page.title: 05THE LAMBING
page.content: {It is April and it is lambing time.}We have{180 Ewes}and by the time lambing is over we will have{twice as many {lambs}as Ewes. This year our lambing started off badly.Many died but after that we had a lot of twins to make up for it .This year we have two different{kinds}of lambs{,Crossbreads {and Blackfaces}.Crossbreds are a cross between Blackface ewes and Leicester tips. We have three Leicester tips and one lamb{.Sometimes}the ewe can not lamb herself so we have to pull it out gently.If a lambs mother dies or if she can not feed the lamb it becomes a pet.We have four pet lambs.We heat up milk and feed them in a pen .They are very tame and a great nuisance .
